name: Cat Death Cat
description:
Year 2023. Spoiled products overflowed landfills, mold spores destroyed all living things, except for one creature... a kitten that was abandoned by its owners. From an early age, he had to eat only what the streets gave him. By chance, he became immune to spores and even managed to mutate. Since then, the kitten has been trying to find the remnants of life and get rid of loneliness.

In this game, when you are defeated, its just the beginning, you still have a chance to get higher score, because after death, you become a ghost!
